::Aerotaur::
       "Argh.  Why can't anyone ever make things easy for me?"  He fumbles 
around in the dark until he finds the switch fro the emergency lights again.  
He flips it on but the survivor is out of sight already.

--part1_99.1bb919dc.28f06c19_boundary
